website_summaries.verdict: Effectively evens out your skin tone and provides a slight matte finish.
pros: Smooth, creamy, and easy to apply
Blends well and feels light on your skin
Light shade doesn’t look orange on fair skin
cons: You'll need to apply sunscreen under this as it contains no SPF

customer_reviews.title: Not the same from Target...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product originally at Target and was running low so I figured why not just buy off Amazon and no trip to Target plus the price was lower...wish I would have just taken the time to go to Target. For starters the one form Target-same brand and shade-makes my face so soft, I absolutely love this product. But the one I received from Amazon was in a different bottle, more runny and it makes my face break out. So I believe it is an out of date/fake product being that it is so different from the one purchased from Target. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s not very heavy, because I don’t like covering my freckles. My face has more red than usual from allergies which makes it the perfect time for the test. I put a before, after, and after (read more you’ll understand. I will still use concealer and a setting powder after applying this. I have added an additional photo after using my NYX under eye concealer and applied a bit of Brow Gel, Mascara and Coty Airspun Translucent Setting PowderFirst photo is fresh with just moisturizer, second is face with only the NYX BB cream, third is after concealer and mascara.
customer_reviews.author: RejuveKate

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color, not the same feel
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers, the formula has changed. The color looks more orange than the natural color I normally use and, when I put it on my face, it was was not as smooth as the original either. Nor is the coverage as good. I'm very disappointed as I really liked the original formula and now I have to find another BB cream that works as well as it used to do. Updated 9/26: I added two photos to show the difference in color.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Lou

customer_reviews.title: becomes pretty much invisible after you put it on
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for. It's light, blends in well to your skin, becomes pretty much invisible after you put it on, and looks very natural. It won't really cover blemishes, but if you're looking for a great tinted moisturizer or just something to even out your skin tone and reduce blotchiness, this is great. I'm in my 40s and it's been difficult to find a foundation that doesn't settle in and highlight wrinkles - this doesn't. I'll definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Lillyanne_M

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Was a little disappointed that the shad changed from old (left) to new (right) making it a tad but too dark for me. It's a thicker consistency than the old formula too. But all in all, still a good cream and will continue to be my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: MellyC

customer_reviews.title: The only BB cream I will ever use
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this BB cream. It is the only one I use at this point. I've had others make my skin oily, cake up after a while, or just not visible. I do use a NYX primer, and it looks so light and flawless on my skin, and gives an air brushed look. My boyfriend notices right away when I started using it, and has complimented it many times. My skin feels good after using it as well. Does not cause any break outs for me or make it too oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is the BEST one there is!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for everyday. No need for concealer, but I mix a dot of this with concealer and it doesnt cover my frecks too much, but it evens my skin tone and looks flawless. It's perfect because it doesnt cake on my skin. It moisturizes into my face and gives a perfect touch of blur on my freckles. Because if I wear all foundation/concealer, I'll just look like casper with a tan neck haha. Anyways, I love this BB creme and I've tried many others, and this one is by far the best! You only need a little bit!
customer_reviews.author: Whiskers2007

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that the product that I ordered because it is not the real product. In the display pictures on the back it clearly states made in Poland. The NYX bb cream I received was made in China. The consistency of the cream is completely different. Im super disappointed, seeing that I planned on using it for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I received a counterfeit item made in China. The formula is very different. It is watery and was already oxidized. The original product is made in Poland.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Silva

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for lazy days where I don't feel like putting on foundation, but I like it so much I now use it nearly every day. It's smooth, easy to apply, spreads nicely, and light weight. Obviously, it's not a full coverage so if you like a dense coverage it's not for you, but if you just want to even your skin tone it's great and feels like you're barely wearing makeup. Pairs well with primer and concealer too when you need a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: COUNTERFEITER PRODUCT! Do not waste your money! I've included a picture of the real product I had purchased at a store vs the fake that I received from this listing. I would not trust this on my skin given it was made in China and has a supposed life of 24 months after opening vs the 9 months the real product has.
customer_reviews.author: WifeyWubs

customer_reviews.title: Not like it used to be! New formula is NO Good!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the old formula. I love the old formula! This new one is dry and cakey and doesn’t go on smoothly. Makes my face look dry and splotchy. I don’t use it. Bummed cuz I really liked the way the old formula felt on my face and how it went on fairly smooth and easy. Hope the bring back the old type and get rid of this new kind that no one is a fan of.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product and shade!
customer_reviews.text: I love Nyx BB cream. I used to use e.l.f. brand tinted moisturizer but they stopped making it. I don't want a full coverage face, but I do have rosy skin and wanted something to give me a smooth look while also toning down the red. I also have dryish skin. This cream handles all of that really well, and stays on a good while. I bought this and the slightly darker color to mix together when I get a bit tanner this summer. 5 stars, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Avoid like the plague
customer_reviews.text: This stuff sucks. Turned orange, went on cakey (tried to apply with fingers, then tried beauty blender, then foundation brush) no matter the method, could not build it up and putting powder over top to set it only made it look worse. Creased up, turned greasy. Avoid at all costs. No7 makes a much better one that I hate to, but will, pay more for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for the fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product with easy spreadability, nice light coverage, and good staying power. I’m docking one star because it has added fragrance, and is unpleasantly perfumey to me. The smell does dissipate within the first 15 minutes, but I find it unpleasant to apply and find myself reaching for my fragrance free products instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie1400

customer_reviews.title: One of Nyx's Best
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. I am a male who wears makeup occasionally, but I don't always want to take the time to put on foundation, concealer, contour, etc. I use this product by itself and apply with a dry beauty blender. It really helps reduce redness, dark spots, and improves the overall look of my skin. It also doesn't take a ton of product to cover my entire face; I could see this tube lasting about a month if you used it every day.
customer_reviews.author: ms big and milky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BB Cream!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! I've tried a lot of different foundation products, and this is the only one I end up buying consistently. It applies and blends really well. I have a pink/pale complexion, and this is one of the few products that don't make me either too tan or too yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Seagraves

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite foundations/BB Creams, etc. I alternate between this and Urban Decay Naked Skin, so for this one being so much cheaper it is a great alternative. The coverage is light, blends very well, and lasts all day. It is a very thin formula, which I like. My only complaint is if I set it down and don't put the cap on, it can leak out on the counter. Since the formula is so thin, a stand-up container would probably have been better. However, I will continue to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail N Detmers

customer_reviews.title: ... loathe wearing foundation so I decided this was a better more natural way to hide imperfections
customer_reviews.text: I loathe wearing foundation so I decided this was a better more natural way to hide imperfections. My only criticisms would be it takes quite a bit to cover my whole face. Definitely doesn’t go a long ways and I’m pretty pale so I bought the lightest color and it’s still a bit dark on me but it’ll be perfect this summer. It’s last almost all day too and doesn’t look cakey! I think it’s a good product considering the price
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for foundation!!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really soooo good. For a bb cream I think it gives really good coverage. I hardly have to go over blemishes with concealer after applying. I have acne prone skin and this does not make me break out. It gives a very natural finish. I still finish with powder on top and a setting spray just makes it all melt together. This has become my go to face product over liquid foundation. The Nude shade was perfect for my fair skin. Will continue to repurchase!! A little goes a decently long way!!
customer_reviews.author: RoxyBo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is by and far the best BB cream I've tried. I mix it with a bit of my facial sunscreen and then rub it onto my skin and it blends so nicely and evenly. It's super easy to apply (as long as I use that mixture) and it does a really nice job of evening out skin tone and giving me a nice glow. I usually go back in with a little on a beauty blender and cover anything I want a bit more coverage for, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Rose Marsicano

customer_reviews.title: Changed the formula
customer_reviews.text: The old formula was perfect. Why go mess up a good thing?! This one is greasy and broke me out. Also made in China not Poland. So, be careful if you used to buy the old formula.
customer_reviews.author: nadia christofferson

customer_reviews.title: The formula has changed.
customer_reviews.text: I used to LOVE this BB cream. Light, airy, and plentiful. Not so with the last tube I bought. First off, the tube itself feels only 3/4 full of product--if that. And it seems the formula has changed, feels and looks more dewy than before. The natural BB cream is slightly darker toned and the place of origin is now listed as PRC= China. Will buy from a reputable and reliable makeup source from now on like Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: Watery, not full coverage . Only reason for 3 Star is not orange or yellow toned.
customer_reviews.text: I am very fair. Like porcelain skin I always have to get lightest shade. This wasn’t terrible as far as skin match. It wasn’t yellowy or orangey as I usually have a problem with that. It did not last long and wasn’t very decent coverage so I give it 3 stars. I prefer a thicker B.B. cream, this was very watery.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this brand
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this brand. Cruelty free and high quality. It goes on smooth and stays on all day without feeling heavy. You don't need to worry if it's not a perfect match because it is semi translucent and will adapt to your skin tone. I recommend also using the primer underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best BB cream I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Best BB cream I've tried, easy to apply and doesn't feel like you're wearing makeup while still providing good amount of coverage. I'm comfortable throwing this on in the morning when I'm running late and not putting anything else on my face and still feel somewhat put together.
customer_reviews.author: kncat05

customer_reviews.title: Best BB Creme
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t anything I don’t like about this makeup. It is excellent & it looks like I’m not wearing makeup, but at same time it has great coverage & evens out any discoloration on face. It’s an amazing BB creme. Debi McD
customer_reviews.author: Debi McDonald

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: I really love NYX products, but this one doesn’t do anything. It doesn't cover, it doesn’t moisturize. Going on, it feels like it would provide coverage, since it doesn’t glide on... It has a kind of heavy feel.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to my Asian Skin
customer_reviews.text: The color matches my yellow undertone. It is invisible and hence suitable for wearing to workplace.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J.M.

customer_reviews.title: but this gives the perfect little coverage to even out and full freckles
customer_reviews.text: I dont wear foundation or alot of makeup, but this gives the perfect little coverage to even out and full freckles. Super light weight doesnt feel greasy or cause any issues with my skin. I alternate between 2 shades depending on the season and it always blends so well with whatever tone my skin is. 1 tube always lasts me so long as a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this as a concealer under my eyes because it's the only thing I've found that won't crease. It does an excellent job of hiding my dark circles and acne scars and leaves my skin with a luminous healthy look. I have really dry skin and this bb cream does not clinge to my dry spots like other products do.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Go elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Gosh, just terrible, it was like water practically. Yuck I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Just as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm a NYX fan- I order it because this color is hard to find in my local stores. I am over 60 and like the lighter coverage- it is a BB makeup- and worked well over moisturizer. I would enjoy trying other products to review! Packaging great- arrived right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha Raisins

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a great BB cream to wear on days I wanted a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great BB cream to wear on days I wanted a lighter make-up that looked more natural! I googled reviews and ordered this product based on the reviews! I'm SOLD! I Love this product, perfect coverage, lightweight and my skin feels great! I rarely wear the heavy make-up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S. Fitz-Simons

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product👍👍👍!!!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight can be layered or worn alone. Does not cause breakouts or drying either and I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin. Either to use with fingers and a great price point. This color works all year round for my Italian skin 👍👍!!
customer_reviews.author: James Destra

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I actually first found this product at Ulta Beauty, and was happy to see that it is also sold online for a couple dollars less. I like this makeup as it is very light and does not feel mask-y on my face. It helps to correct my somewhat ruddy complexion, too.
customer_reviews.author: P. Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream. I hate heavy looking foundation that cakes on your face. This moisturizes. Provides spf and is smooth on the skin. If you are looking for a lightweight tinted moisturizer this is it
customer_reviews.author: Carla Iommetti

customer_reviews.title: Too thick and not near my complexion
customer_reviews.text: It’s too thick of a consistency. Wish it was more water based. Color is closest to my olive complexion but you can see a slight difference.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: ... time I've boughten a makeup product online that I loved and match my skin to a T
customer_reviews.text: First time I've boughten a makeup product online that I loved and match my skin to a T. I have fair skin and this helps cover up redness and makes me look more put together on any given day without having a full face of makeup. Will definitely repurchase after I run out of my first tube.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: It applies like a lotion and blends wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I have combination, sensitive skin and have used this for more than two years without irritation or breakouts. It applies like a lotion and blends wonderfully. You can use a pea sized amount, or more, and achieve more of a foundation-type coverage, or just apply to spots, as I do every morning, and will be good to go. I'm certain there exist better BB creams (because I've tried them), but I'm not rich - *For the money*, this is a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin B

customer_reviews.title: quality BB creme
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple of years after discovering it on Amazon. Perfect BB creme, goes on smoothly no streaking nor does it cause dryness. Highly recommend. I have very mature skin.
customer_reviews.author: dori daigle

customer_reviews.title: Great Texture
customer_reviews.text: I love Nyx products and the BB Cream is a great middle ground when it comes to foundation and moisturizer. The thickness is not overbearing and doesn't feel heavy on my face, which is nice. It lasts for a whole workday and then some, but I always follow a long day with a good makeup remover (I prefer Glossier) and hydrating serums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best B.B. cream
customer_reviews.text: My favorite B.B. cream! Love NYX and this B.B. cream is so light weight and just smoothes our your skin. I have sensitive skin and I wear this everyday and it does not clog my pores or make me break out like other creams/foundations.
customer_reviews.author: Nattie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I normally have oily skin but this helps keep that under control while not feeling heavy on the skin. It also has a pretty good coverage for being a bb cream, maybe even compareable to a light coverage foundation. Definitely my go to.
customer_reviews.author: AHLX7

customer_reviews.title: Best BB
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a BB cream forever and this stuff is amazing. I'm extremely pale and have sensitive skin but NYX bb in nude blends well and doesn't clog pores. This is a beauty essential.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color match and gives dewy look to skin
customer_reviews.text: Great color for my skin, occasionally am bothered by the hint of smell from the makeup. I love this brand and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I love this BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this BB cream! I've tried many others, and found I'm actually allergic to most of them. I haven't had a reaction to this one at all, and it leaves a very light, natural looking finish! NYX is my new favorite cosmetic brand.
customer_reviews.author: Steph and Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. One tube lasts me about a month using a little everyday. Great to wear alone to even out skin tone or with powder for more makeup look.
customer_reviews.author: JKATX

customer_reviews.title: Too dark
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lightest color and it’s way too dark. I look like an orange
customer_reviews.author: k a r

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: the best BB cream I have EVER used. the coverage is buildable, so much so that I don't even wear concealer with it. you don't need to use a primer or a setting powder/spray and it stays on all day. it does not dry my skin out at all. it comes off easily with a wipe.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for the money. It is the best “drug store” brand BB cream I have found.
customer_reviews.author: MollySaysWhat

customer_reviews.title: Good BB Cream especially for summer
customer_reviews.text: Good BB Cream especially for summer. I can say that it covers almost nothing, but it makes skin tone more smooth and fresh. I think I will order more of this product because it finished very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: First time using a bb cream. It does make skin look better. I have no complaints and am still testing out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have senstive skin and this made my face break out. Wouldn't recommend for use on combination skin. But gave to my friend who has dry skin and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Scholarly_Learner

customer_reviews.title: I've used a lot of NYX products without incident but ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of NYX products without incident but this was not that. This BB cream caused my skin to break out all over and it made my skin itchy to the point where I thought I might be having an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: The best BB cream! I use this every time, then apply my concealer, then powder foundation. It makes my skin feel and look super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: good on its own
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, I use it just as a foundation. I have dry skin on my face in the winter, and I do feel like this moisturizes rather than dries it out. I think it matches my skin tone really well, and blends easily. I tried this because I can't find the Maybelline bb cream in the light shade anymore, and I think this is a good substitution for that.
customer_reviews.author: j.f1106

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This works great and was the perfect shade for me. It has medium coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in the SAME BOX as a 15-lb item so it was crushed and popped open.
customer_reviews.author: fgmom

customer_reviews.title: I wear this everyday!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It makes my skin look even without the heaviness of regular makeup. It just evens everything out and lasts all day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this from ulta bought I thought I would get it from amazon because it’s cheaper. It was not the same as the one from ulta. The formula must have been different because it made my face incredibly greasy. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not impressed either
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Not bad but not impressed either. A bit lighter in color than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gretta

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Creamy and goes on smooth just like a moisturizer but with just the right amount of coverage. Will definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Nice light coverage
customer_reviews.text: Goes on light and blends in to look natural. Very light coverage. Helps diminish some of the redness in my face that I have. Very light - not greasy. Don't even know you have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Robinotl

customer_reviews.title: Natural look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Barely there with natural look and feels light and airy.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: Smooth makeup base
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Soft and smooth Doesn't look like a mask ,like some other foundation makeup
customer_reviews.author: BP mom

customer_reviews.title: Best BB cream I have found !
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is the best bb cream I have found! I have to type of skin where no makeup lasts very long but this one lasts all day if you set it with a good powder. I would just recommend going a shade lighter since it can be dark!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blends in nicely. Not oily. Feel nice on my skin. Feels like high quality makeup. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: karen b

customer_reviews.title: Light feeling, best tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite bb cream/tinted moisturizer ever. It feels very light on the skin, doesn’t look cakey and is very natural looking. Covers redness in skin and evens out color. Gives a good “blur” to hide imperfections
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this under my regular foundation, it definitely stays all day, by the time I get home my make up feels and looks great! Now if I can find something to help my eye shadow do the same! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: TS Walker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love this B.B. CREAM. I have gone through several of them. It’s light and blends smoothly. I use my fingertips to apply it. It doesn’t give a lot of coverage but it does cover minor skin imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Sweet

customer_reviews.text: Color not dark enough. You can get this product in better color and price from Maybelline
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya Strekalova

customer_reviews.title: The perfect "no makeup" makeup
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I mix it with my face lotion before applying. It's the perfect "no makeup" makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lilienthal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just as good if not better than the more expensive BB Cream I'd been using. And Nyx doesn't test on animals! I'm a convert, will very likely buy more when this runs out.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sperling

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other bb creams but honestly this one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered it yesterday. Amazing. Wonder why stores are closing. I went to stores. No stock in shelves. Wasted time and gas.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Apply with egg shaped sponge. Quick and easy, very forgiving. This has enough cover to pretty much even out color.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love most NYX products, but I wasn't too crazy about this one. I have normal skin, but this made my skin look really shiny for some reason. It did have pretty good coverage for a bb cream, but it just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ajk

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and color
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and color. Finding fair olive toned foundation isn't easy for this price. I like the way this bb cream feels and leaves my skin feeling at the end of the day. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherAnn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this for the most part. I find the color to be kind of orange, and it makes my face feel greasy after a few hours. I still need to play around with it more to find the best way to apply it and the right amount of product, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Product is really good about covering flaws but dries my skin out. I have combination skin and it really makes it flaky. All and all good product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite BB cream! Good coverage and matches my NC25ish skin perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SandyBeach4me

customer_reviews.title: Different color and texture than original
customer_reviews.text: Completely different color and Texture than the one I was running low on. The one I have now is much lighter and silkier than the one I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this BB cream its perfect for summer time. Like most BB creams there isn't a lot of coverage however you can build up a little bit with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Perfect for someone who doesn’t like foundation but ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Perfect for someone who doesn’t like foundation but still wants an even skin tone. I’m wearing this on my wedding day ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Baran

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and isn't greasy. Great for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Brittaktie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to get rid of shine and minimize wrinkles without heavy makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Broddrick

customer_reviews.title: I love this cream -- I have a very pale and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream -- I have a very pale and sensitive skin. It is a perfect primer and moisturizer for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glowy skin
customer_reviews.text: Love how it matches my own skin colour even though the cream i ordered is a little bit darker than my own skin Tone. Looks really natural, gives me a healthy glow, for coverage I would give a 7 out of 10. Overal still satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: While this product is nice for the price, it is too oily for my combination skin. It goes on smoothly but after an hour feels heavy aNd begins to slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Eyelandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage but I feel like it caused me to break out a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: bomb dot com
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t break my skin out and fits my fair skin perfectly. Actually the only BB cream I can use. 12 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage without looking cakey
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this to foundation. Good coverage without looking cakey. Doesn't cause any breakouts either. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: like mixing this with a foundation to get my right color
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't blend well into the skin and caused breakouts. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Armand90

customer_reviews.title: Great Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a great BB Cream. I do not use it daily, but have not had any issues with breakouts or irritation when I do use it. It's very light and easy to put on. It blends well and is almost shear with tint. The color (Natural) is nice for my skin, that's fair/light with some redness and sun damage. I would definitely recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It blends really well to your skin and looks very natural. It helps evening out your skin and gives you a natural shimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this BB cream it makes my complexion even and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this BB cream it makes my complexion even and makes my skin look natural and doesn't look like I tried so hard. I've bought this 3 times already and will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ciarra Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Light cream for everyday usage. Does not cover everything but still can be used on daily basis. Good texture and formula
customer_reviews.author: Anushik Shirvanyan

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bb cream
customer_reviews.text: Omg. I absolutely love this bb cream. I'm pretty picky too. I am 40 with fair skin. But I go tanning once a week. I have a nice little glow. I have combination skin. Its dry AND oily. I have used several different kinds of bb creams. Expensive ones. Estee lauder. Kat von dee. Urban decay. All of them never impressed me enough to purchase a second time. Most of them still sit in my makeup drawer more than half full. I am truly surprised by this bb cream. Really. I am. And I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Swearngin

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP BB Cream - Nude
feature_bullets: BB CREAM BEAUTY BALM: Perfect the “no makeup” look with NYX Professional Makeup BB Cream Beauty Balm. Oil-free and lightweight, this luxurious mineral-infused BB Cream formula hydrates skin & helps the complexion appear smoother and more even toned.

LIGHTWEIGHT COLOR: Our BB Cream Beauty Balm was developed as an all-in-one cream to hydrate, prime, and perfect your skin. Wear our BB Cream as a primer under your foundation, or alone for a touch of lightweight color.

FACE FROM FOUNDATION TO FINISH: Complete your makeup look with our full line of NYX Professional Makeup face products to aid in color-correction & coverage from blush, bronzer, foundations & contouring concealer to palettes powders & setting sprays.

CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is certified & acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We don't test any of our products on animals.

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all of our professional makeup & beauty products today, from eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, brushes & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
